name: Sleepy Sheep Build-A-Dream
description:
My submission for Godot Wild Jam #53, featuring the theme "Assembly Required" (which I suggested).

It also follows the Four Color Limit wildcard, those being #ebd320, #db41c3, #ebebeb and #000000, sourced from Aseprite's NES palette.

Gamepad is supported.

Font is Public Pixel from ggbot.itch.io/

Music is "Home" from loyaltyfreakmusic.com/music/captain-glouglous-incredible-week-soundtrack/
